# Create segments for teams

As your organization grows, you can use segmentation to manage Adaptive Metrics on a per-team or per-service basis. With segments in place, each team filters the UI to view recommendations and manage rules that apply only to their specific metrics.
Enter a descriptive **Name** for your segment that clearly identifies the team it applies to.
Enter a **Label** — the metric label that distinguishes the metrics belonging to a particular team (for example, `namespace` in Kubernetes).
Enter a **Value** — the criteria for matching the label (for example, `web-frontend` or `web-backend`).
(Optional) Select **Fallback to default rules** to apply general rules to metrics that do not belong to a specific team segment.
